DOC.brief_summary: This randomize pilot clinical trial study survivorship care plan improve quality life breast cancer survivor . Survivorship care planning may reduce stress improve well-being quality life cancer survivor .
DOC.brief_title: Survivorship Care Planning Improving Quality Life Breast Cancer Survivors
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . Test effectiveness navigation intervention survivorship care plan ( SCP ) -breast cancer survivor ( BCS ) template booklet access adhere SCP-BCS guideline compare control group receive usual care SCP-BCS template booklet . SECONDARY OBJECTIVES : I . Develop clinically psychosocially responsive SCP-breast cancer survivor ( SCP-BCS ) template English English-Spanish adopt American Society Clinical Oncology ( ASCO ) -SCP . II . Assess acceptability , utility format preference ( electronic v paper ) SCP-BCS template . OUTLINE : Participants randomize 1 2 arm . ARM I : Participants receive SCP-BCS template booklet receive counsel session patient navigator 40 minute twice weekly 4 session . ARM II : Participants receive SCP-BCS template booklet receive standard follow-up care . After completion study treatment , participant follow 6 12 month .
DOC.criteria: In early survivorship phase , define postsurgery end active treatment 18 month post active treatment stage 03 breast cancer ( BCA ) Reside Southern California BCS treat Kaiser , health maintenance organization ( HMO ) provider , exclude since SCP implementation project underway BCS exclude base cancer treatment receive history diagnosis mild depression , anxiety , hypertension diabetes
